jmines.control.listeners
Class KeyListenerForMainFrame

java.lang.Object
  jmines.control.listeners.KeyListenerForMainFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, EventListener
public class KeyListenerForMainFrame
extends Object
implements KeyListener

The listener interface for receiving keyboard events (keystrokes).

Author:
Zleurtor
